mapper.select: select * from member where member_seller_authority = 'Y' and member_type = 2

WITH this_month AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_this_month FROM member WHERE member_seller_create_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ), last_month AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_last_month FROM member WHERE member_seller_create_date >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) AND member_seller_create_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ) SELECT CASE WHEN last_month.count_last_month = 0 THEN CASE WHEN this_month.count_this_month = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100 END ELSE ROUND( (this_month.count_this_month - last_month.count_last_month) / last_month.count_last_month * 100, 2 ) END AS increase_percentage FROM this_month, last_month

WITH this_month AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_this_month FROM member WHERE member_customer_create_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ), last_month AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_last_month FROM member WHERE member_customer_create_date >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) AND member_customer_create_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ) SELECT CASE WHEN last_month.count_last_month = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND( (this_month.count_this_month - last_month.count_last_month) / last_month.count_last_month * 100, 2 ) END AS increase_percentage FROM this_month, last_month
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_type = 2 AND TO_CHAR(member_seller_create_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_type = 1 AND TO_CHAR(member_customer_create_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(member_last_access, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS day, COUNT(*) AS visitor_count FROM MEMBER WHERE member_last_access BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(member_last_access, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY day;
